transcript.text: Oh mr. Daniel John Lee with trace trees
this podcast is being recorded now on
the fourth day of all the fourth day
since yom teruah the fourth day of the
seventh ebru month which is the month of
all the fall feasts hallelujah this
podcast is called confirmations from the
12 messages to the 144,000 over the
course the last several days yah has
sent people to me that have provided
numerous confirmations that he did
indeed deliver these 12 messages to
144,000 and that I Daniel was a mere
vehicle for the information to be
transmitted through the first
confirmation was the one I mentioned in
the PostScript video I made showing how
the first video came out on 94 and the
last came out my 925 a time span of
exactly 21 days or three weeks this
perfectly matches the three weeks three
weeks passed and Daniel had to do in
order for Yahshua to break through the
spiritual warfare and delivered him the
message see Daniel chapter 10 verses 1
through 13 took 21 days of spiritual
warfare for the 12 messages for the
144,000 to break through next a family
from Idaho told me that they had felt
yacht tell them to fast from all meat
and strong a drink being on 94 this was
before they were ever aware of my videos
it did not break this fast until yom
teruah on 10 6 then as I began making
the videos found a beautiful priestly
breastplate 12 stones graphic to place
each video on you can find that on the
website at the very top of the website
you'll see a link for that says hundred
message from honor 44,000 you click on
it and see the graphic I'm talking about
however she then began to notice that as
each message was delivered it fit
perfectly with the meeting of the tribe
that correspond to the stone upon which
link was placed she did not tell me any
of this until after my messages were
complete nor could she have land this as
she had no idea what the messages would
be but only had the order upon which
message would go with which stone I was
totally ignorant of which stone was
which and certainly did not know the
meanings of the tribes so this was
totally yaws and
the first message of 144,000 was placed
on the stone for the tribe of Natalie
which means a wrestler or striving and
of course the 144,000 are those who
wrestle with yah like Jacob of old and
obtained the blessing the second message
was placed on the stone for God which
means a company and the second method is
all about how the company will be split
into separating the righteous one from
the Pretender the third was placed on
the stone for Asher which means happy or
many blessings and this third video is
all about the blessings of being
transported by ahs Eagles to the same
place the fourth was placed on the stone
for Benjamin which means son of my right
hand and the fourth message was all
about the characteristics of the type of
people who make up 144,000 sons of ya's
right hand indeed the fifth message was
placed on the stone for F rahim which
means fruitful and the fifth message is
all about the many Christians who have
been missed taught but have pure hearts
and be allowed to reach the safe place
so they can learn from the hundred
forty-four thousand about the beauty of
observing Torah 144,000 will be fruitful
as they guide these missions and F frame
has always been known as the fruitful
house of Christianity the sixth message
was placed on the stone for Dan means
judging this message begins with Apostle
Paul's judging admonitions about not
falling into lust and idol worship as
the children of Israel did in the Exodus
and how it relates to the coming Exodus
in 2014 the seventh as such was placed
on the stone for Reuben which means
viewing or behold the Sun and the
seventh message is all about be holding
the coming events in the next six months
from 1013 drew 414 and how to endure
until the safe place and eeping one's
eyes on the Sun even Yahshua HaMashiach
the eighth message was placed on stone
for issaq art which means reward or what
is given by way every word and the
eighth message is all out how the
faithful ones will obtain the blessing
of dancing like butterflies in the safe
place the ninth message was placed on
the stone for Judah which means
confession or praise of young
and the ninth message directly
references the tribe of Judah being
placed on the east side of the camp and
how points toward the safe place being
east of modern-day Jerusalem also when
we confess Yahshua the men we are cast
out of camp and very Oscars reproach
leaving the camp the tenth message was
placed on the Sun for Manasseh which
means forgetting and the tenth message
was about a fall of Lucifer a lament for
this wicked angel and how he will be
forgotten and also how once he is cast
out by 3 11 14 he will longer be able to
bring accusations against believers in
the high places of the heavenlies thus
false accusations with the body of
Messiah will be forgotten during a time
in a safe place leading to unparalleled
unity the 11th message was placed in the
stone for Simeon which means hearing and
obeying and the 11th message was about
how Esther who heard and obeyed her
uncle and yah cleansed and purified
herself for the king just as the bride
in the wilderness will cleanse and
purify herself in preparation for the
King of Kings the 12 message was placed
on the stone for zebulon which means
home or dwelling place and of course the
last night of that video is about how
next year we pure hearts will be in a
safe or dwelling place so as reader or
in this case the watcher of this YouTube
can see there were three confirmations
that these 12 messages came from the
hand of Yahweh and not Daniel John Lee
may I be glorified and made these
messages do all that yon tended to
accomplish and this article will also be
placed on the website at wwc I am Tauron
com Shalom yah bless and happy 4th day
of all eyes are now only six days away
